data.title: Report to update Employee s Assignment and Salary records when current contracts are ratified For Contracts ratified in the processing week
data.description: Report similar to deviation HCM 4400. As per Bali s KPMG conversation with Neha Michael Joanne, on 5 13 21, existing report Report to update Employee s Assignment and Salary records when contracts are ratified will be split into two reports. 1 Report to update Employee s Assignment and Salary records when contracts are retro ratified For Contracts retro ratified on a specific date 2 Report to update Employee s Assignment and Salary records when current contracts are ratified For Contracts ratified in the processing week All agreed that there is a gap that we cannot build one report to satisfy the current and retro transactions considering the configurations, delivered processes being used on Wage Progression and the report requirements. The good part is most of the logic used to build the report for processing retro transactions HCM 4400 can be reused on the current transactions report. The effort for development of the second report will be less than 25 of the first report. data.title: Decision on future state of AM Category, AM Job class and AM Override fields in HCM Cloud for Wave 1
data.description: Current State AEC AM Team sends a request to the AEC Data Integrity team to override the AM Category of an employee. AEC Data Integrity Team will insert a new row in Job data for the employee and update the AM Override flag to Y , update the AM Category with the value provided by the AEC team then save the data. Future State Final Decision AEC AM Team will continue to send the request to AEC Data Integrity team if there s a need to override the AM Category of an employee. AM Category will continue to be maintained in PS Coexistence will derive the AM Category and AM Job class. If AM Category needs override: Data integrity team to create shell row in Cloud with the action action reason for overriding AM Ctg Coexistence will push the shell row to PS Data integrity team will update the AM Category value in PS Job Data

data.title: Exception Rated Report
data.description: AEC Teams Contracts, Data Integrity, Trust, Payroll, Accounting and Call Center require a report that will list all employees who are on exception rate. These are employees whose hourly salary amount is greater than the Grade Step rate indicated in the Grade Ladder. AEC teams can run this report on demand. They should have the option to run the report for a specific Date and by a specific Collective Agreement or group of Collective Agreements up to 100 or All Collective Agreements.

data.title: No reporting available on person level seniority dates
data.description: Seniority dates include: Position Entry Date, Last Hire Date, Benefits Service Date, Department Entry Date, ect. Part of the logic needed to assign required training at Albertsons through the OTBI analyses requires the use of seniority dates configured at the person level. There s a MOS Doc ID, 2629436.1, that indicates that this is a current product gap with an associated enhancement. That enhancement Bug 25183498 shows a status of scheduled for a future release. Oracle has informed has this functionality will not be available prior to go live. Currently evaluating workarounds and will develop a plan to address functionality ASAP. This rule is used in 75 of learning rulesets, so its MUST HAVE functionality. accountid:5eebaeab1b849f0ac0abc6f3 accountid:5a68d06bed79b82e1322e77b accountid:5eebb0440856d00ac3671179 accountid:5f4fb8efd0884f004937aa4f accountid:5a67a91b8b530e2868b1aa64 accountid:557058:d5e328c1 5c15 4967 abe6 75862c1498f2 accountid:5aea224c7dd1e556227bf87f accountid:5e1517fd7a22c90da0c62b11 accountid:5c585ca195f91f3a04204623 accountid:5a67a91a4e6fa32306362384

data.title: Unplanned work that must be accommodated for HCM 5813
data.description: As part of the Coexistence 001 feed, PeopleSoft has requested fields from HCM Cloud to keep two systems in sync one of those fields is FLSA status. This risk is associated with the mismatching job code data in the two systems and deciding where the code changes need to occur. If the decision is to make changes to FSLA status needs to occur in PS. The additional unplanned work will impact the current Wave 1 timing for delivering the Coexistence 001 functionality. Team meeting scheduled for 4 30 21 to discuss where the data changes will occur in PS or HCM. If PS, the team will perform a risk analysis to understand the impact on the project timing and escalate as an issue.

data.title: Seniority dates recalculation retro, current and future
data.description: Current State: Seniority dates are calculated automatically in PS when a job record is updated. There is no manual recalc process needed. Future state: Seniority dates don t get updated automatically with corresponding assignment change. Either the user has to manually enter the appropriate seniority date change for that assignment change or the scheduled batch process schedule is TBD will have to be run to recalculate the seniority dates. Depending upon the timing of scheduled batch process, there could be a delay between assignment change and seniority recalc. accountid:5f3eecc81ac29c0045e9f70b : Update this once the discussion has happened and assign to Change Mgmnt team accountid:5f2af61770fb250022fda67c as we need to determine who all can adjust the seniority dates manually as well. accountid:5a67a917f01d171fcf33cbe8 accountid:5fda26d1692b790110481757 accountid:5f6e03f6ad3484006aa0008c

data.title: E Signature tasks in request information job application flow
data.description: While an e signature can be obtained for the overall Request Information JAF, individual e signature tasks which request the candidate to sign on consent forms cannot be added. This is an application constraint which cannot be changed via configuration. See attached slide for solution approach.

data.title: Request information job application flow should ask job specific questions
data.description: Job Application Flows JAFs along with Candidate Selection Processes CSPs are attached to Job Requisitions. The Request Information JAF should be triggered after the candidate accepts job offer. The questions in the Request Information JAF should be tied to the specific job. The answers will help trigger the correct type of background check. Delivered functionality does not support this requirement. See attached document for solution approaches for a workaround.

data.title: Incident INC6736977 Virtual Desktop logs out automatically causing issue with Inactive employee load
data.description: Hi accountid:5eebaeab1b849f0ac0abc6f3 We are facing an issue with the Albertsons virtual desktop auto log off that happens approximately every 9 10 hours. The system always used to log off automatically but was not an issue earlier because we didn t have any processes running continuously for 10 hours earlier. However, the Inactive Worker Assignment file received in CRP1 is having about 7.4 million rows and the file transformation generation is taking 10 hours. The work is lost if the system logs off automatically overnight.

data.title: SR 3 25556151501 : Performance Issue joining Learning and Workforce Management subject Ares
data.description: Customer Problem Description Problem Summary OTBI Report Performance Issue when joining Subject area Learning and Workforce assignment Problem Description Issue 1: We are trying to join Workforce Learning Learning Management Real Time subject area with Workforce Management Worker Assignment Real Time subject area using the measures as Learner Count and Headcount respectively. This is to get the column Worker Payroll Name from the Workforce Management Worker Assignment Real Time subject area. But due to this we facing the performance issue and hence report is keep on running in OTBI. Issue 2: Similarly we are trying to join Workforce Learning Learning Management Real Time subject area with Workforce Management Person Real Time subject area using the measures as Learner Count and Person Count respectively. This is to get the column External Identifier from the Workforce Management Person Real Time subject area. But due to this also we facing the performance issue and hence report is keep on running in OTBI. Error Codes Report Keep running Problem Category Subcategory Reports and Analytics Run, Customize, Schedule, Subject Areas, Tables, Seeded Reports, FTP etc Uploaded Files File: External Identifier Test.catalog accountid:5eebaeab1b849f0ac0abc6f3 accountid:5aea224c7dd1e556227bf87f

data.title: SR 3 25408576921: Limitation in fetching Max entries 1000 rows in a single fetch from Atom feeds via OIC HCM Adapter
data.description: accountid:5f7f15e5a2909600754f24e3 While testing the consumption of large volume of transactions from atom feeds, we found that the OIC HCM Adapter can consume only 1000 rows at a time. SR 3 25408576921 : Issue in fetching Max entries from Atom feeds via Oracle HCM adapter We requested Oracle to provide an workaround by which we will be able to pull all the transactions in a single fetch. Oracle response is As this is an expected behavior, there is no workaround for having more than 1000 dates. Unfortunately this is the maximum entries what could be used . data.title: Report to calculate the number of hours that need to be credited for step progression transfer scenarios
data.description: This report will be run on a weekly basis to calculate the exact number of hours that need to be credited when employees transfer or are moved from one grade step to another. The report will need to look at the eligibility profiles associated with the old grade step and the new grade step to calculate the number of hours that need to be credited. The logic for calculating the hours worked is documented in the Grade Step Progression Solution Design Document. The report should also look at any Hours that are credited on the Progression Hours Credited flexfield on the assignment page and add subtract it to determine the total credited hours for that week.

data.title: Report to update Employee s Salary records for Shaw s employees GWI 90 day and yearly increase
data.description: A report needs to be created to pull all Shaw s GWI eligible employees and the output of the report would be a Salary file in an HDL ready format so that it can be uploaded back into Oracle. The GWI Pay Matrix GWI Increase amounts by Bargaining Unit Location Job PT FT Status will be stored in a user defined table which the report will then use to determine the new salary amounts current salary GWI amount . The new GWI increases should also be updated with the correct action action reason PAY GWI needs to be mapped to cloud values

data.title: Report to update GWI dates 90 Day Effective Date and Yearly Increase Effective Date
data.description: A report needs to be created to pull all Shaw s GWI eligible employees. The employee s assignment should contain the 90 day and yearly increase effective dates. The output of the report should be an HDL ready file that can be used to update the person s GWI dates on the assignment 90 Day GWI Date: If the employee has received an increase within the 90 day period tracked using action action reason PAY MER needs to be mapped to cloud values , the date needs to be made blank Yearly GWI Date: If the employee receives an increase other than PAY MIN and PAY RSM needs to be mapped to cloud values , the date needs to be updated to a year from the increase. If the increase was due to PAY MIN or PAY RSM the date does not need to be changed

data.title: Report to update Employee s Salary records for ACME s Across the Board ATB increases
data.description: A report needs to be created to pull all ACME employees that are on their ceiling step and the output of the report would be a Salary file in an HDL ready format so that it can be uploaded back into Oracle. The ATB rates will be stored at the Grade Ladder level and the effective dates on the salary file should match the ATB effective dates. A sample of the Salary file is attached to this ticket.

data.title: Report to update Employee s Assignment and Salary records when contracts are ratified
data.description: Once the Grade ladder is updated with the new rates, the report needs to generate the necessary salary and assignment files with the updated information in an HDL ready format so that it can be uploaded back into Oracle. The report will need to produce two files: 1 Salary Existing salary rows need to be corrected with the new rates and a new action action reason. A new salary row also needs to be inserted on the contract ratification dates with the new rates and new action action reason 2 Assignment Existing assignment rows need to be updated with the new action action reason and a new sequence. Corresponding Work Terms rows will also need to be updated to match the assignment records. A new assignment work terms row also needs to be inserted on the contract ratification dates with the new action action reason Details of the report format and the necessary files are included in the attachment. The report needs to contain two drop downs: 1 Grade Ladder Name 2 Ratification Date

data.title: Ability for HR to enter Credited Hours for Wage Progression on Core HR Actions Transfer, Assignment change, etc.
data.description: During Assignment Change Transfer scenarios, Credited Hours for wage progression should be calculated and stored in a Benefit Balance. The system driven calculation for credited hours should be based on the hours accumulated in the Progression Hours Worked Benefit Balance bucket and the entry criteria for the new step. The difference should be credited could be a positive or a negative hours credit depending on the scenario . HR should also have the ability to provide an additional credit. The requirement is to include a new flexfield and a hyperlink on the Transfer Change Assignment action page this list may include a few more HR Actions . Flexfield: Progression Hours Credited Hyperlink to PSFT Accumulated Units page Any Credits entered on the Progression Hours Credited flexfield should be added subtracted to the system calculated credits and deposited into the Progression Credited Hours Benefit Balance.

data.title: Bargaining Unit cannot span across Unions
data.description: Current State: There are 63 bargaining units that are tied to more than one Union. In the current state Bargaining Units in PeopleSoft rollup to multiple Unions many to many relation .This is due to two reasons: Multiple Union codes are set up in the system for same unions to reflect how these contracts are negotiated. Typically clerks, meat, and pharmacy even though in same Union will have very different rules. There are locals with same code. Local 1546 is in both UFCW as well as International Assoc. of Machinists. but here it is two separate locals happen to have same number. Future State: a Bargaining Unit can be tied to only one union. In the future state it is decided to keep bargaining unit codes unique to Unions by prefixing union code to existing bargaining unit codes. Example: New BU code for Local 1546 in Union 001 will be 0011546 New BU code for Local 1546 in Union 006 will be 0061546. No Changes will be made to existing PS system. There will be mapping built in Coexistence integration.

data.title: Batch Processes in Compensation
data.description: The following batch processes will be run as part of the compensation cycle: Process Name Description Start Workforce Compensation Cycle Build manager worksheets with eligible workers for a new plan and initiate the compensation cycle. Refresh Workforce Compensation Data Synchronize workforce compensation data with HR data, update plan design and currency conversion rates, and recalculate summary data. Transfer Workforce Compensation Data to HR Post base pay adjustments to salary records, job, grade, and position changes to human resources, and element entries to payroll. Back Out Workforce Compensation Data Reverse a completed Start Workforce Compensation Cycle process or remove salary, payroll and HR changes posted. Purge Workforce Compensation Data Remove unneeded transaction data from prior plan cycles. Notify Managers of Approaching Due Date Send notifications to worksheet managers to notify them that worksheet due dates are approaching. Notify Managers That Cycle Is Open Or Closed Send notifications to worksheet managers to notify them that a plan cycle is now open or closed. Process Workforce Compensation Change Statements Centrally manage the worker compensation change statements Synchronize Hierarchy Synchronize hierarchy to Oracle Transactional Business Intelligence

data.title: Eligibility Criteria for the Annual Merit Increase Process Philippines Only

data.title: Process used to bring forward manage retro dated transactions
data.description: In PS today there is a custom process that brings forward all assignment information to any future rows when a retro dated transaction is entered. For example, if an employee goes through a transfer on 1 1 2021, then a location change on 2 1 2021, and then a retro change is entered in on 1 1 2021, all information from that retro transaction should flow forward and replace the information within the 2 1 2021 transaction. We need to replicate this type of process in Cloud in future state. We will need this capability for Self service transactions. any updates done by Joanne s team can be managed manually by them. We need to ensure that any changes to the position gets applied to future dated transaction related to the position as well in an automated manner. accountid:5ef67a374d302e0ac3268b48 accountid:5f6e03f6ad3484006aa0008c please update the description if it needs anything else.

Queue Capacity
data.description: Queue Capacity will be defined as 15 per Agent . At any point in time an agent will only have 15 tickets Tickets that are in Resolved, Waiting and Closed will not be considered for Capacity Only tickets that are in New, In progress and Re opened will be considered for calculating the capacity threshold of ticket assignment

data.title: For conversion from contingent worker to employee, contingent workers will apply to a requisition as an internal candidate
data.description: Current : For conversion from contingent worker to employee, contingent workers don t apply and are processed as a direct hire. Some contingent workers do apply for roles using the external career site, but there is no way for People Soft to automatically identify the worker since contingent workers are not in People Soft. Future : For conversion from contingent worker to employee, contingent workers will apply to a requisition as an internal candidate and move through the normal recruiting process screening, onboarding, and access provisioning . Oracle will recognize the existing worker record based on first name, last name, and DOC and use the same person ID. Contingent worker applies through the external career site, not internal. Contingent workers will not have access to the internal career site. Learning completion history will be associated with the person record. So what: Contingent workers will need to take an extra step and apply to a requisition as an internal candidate

data.title: For coexist, need to strip any action reason code values before hypen

In Cloud each of these values will be prefixed: PAY CON TER CON As part of co exist, the first 3 digits and the hyphen need to be stripped when sending back to PS

The steps in the process flow will include the following: 1 Associate adds an anytime document 2 Associate adds the list of participants to request feedback from Associate s Line Manager to have visibility into the participant list 3 Feedback request gets sent to the participants 4 Participant s provide feedback 5 Manager to view participant s feedback 6 Manager to provide feedback to the associate 7 Manager to share the performance document with the associate A single questionnaire will be sent out to all participants including the Line Manager to provide responses to. Every question will have a rating and a comment for the participant to fill. So what: I will need to learn how to use anytime performance documents, view feedback, and provide feedback and share the document with my direct reports.

data.title: Email Option to create a Service Request
data.description: An Employee can send an email for assistance to a support mailing address ex: support mycompany.com . Oracle HR Help Desk will monitor this mailbox, generate a service request using information from the email message and send an automated receipt to the sender acknowledging their request. This service request will be created and assigned to an Agent in the HR Help Desk application. When the Agent responds, the service request will be updated and Oracle HR Help Desk will send the same message via email, back to the employee. This functionality is available for usage . Albertson to confirm if they would like to use this option. Valid use cases for this deviation. Inbound Email Action : Create SR Category FAX DOCUSIGN routing to Banking Desk, Severity 1 From Address: docusign.net Synopsis : Email with Subject contains docusign: or DocuSign: Indemnity Form is received Category should be set to paycheck : indemnity Queue should be set to Banking Desk Priority is High 5 day SLA Name of SR Email Subject date time stamp Body of SR will be text of email Attachment from email will be attached to the SR. Primary contact will be empty and EDITABLE rpocess will require identifying the employee based on the attached form and updated the SR to associate it with the case. If the case is assigned outside of the banking desk queue, it will be visible to other agent users. Security constraints : Only Banking Desk members have access to these HR cases. Inbound Email Action : Create SR FAX FAX2MAIUL Leave of Absence queue, severity 1 From Address reply.fax2mail.com http: reply.fax2mail.com Synopsis : Email with Subject contains A fax has arrived is received Category should be set to Leave of Absence Fax Queue should be set to Leave of Absence Priority is Urgent 1 day SLA Name of SR Email Subject date time stamp Body of SR will be text of email Attachments from email will be attached to the SR. Primary contact will be empty and EDITABLE process will require identifying the employee based on the attached form and updated the SR to associate it with the case. If the case is assigned outside of the banking desk queue, it will be visible to other agent users. Security constraints : Only Leave of Absence members have access to these HR cases. cInbound Email Action : Create SR HRIS Data Inquiry HRIS queue, Severity 2 Synopsis : Email where to address is esc.hris.request safeway.com mailto:esc.hris.request safeway.com or esc.hris.request albertsons.com mailto:esc.hris.request albertsons.com Category should be set to HRIS : report request Queue should be set to Report Request Priority is Medium 10 day SLA Name of SR Email Subject date time stamp Body of SR will be text of email Attachment from email will be attached to the SR. Primary contact will be a lookup of the sent from email. If no user found, will be empty and can be updated. Security constraints : Only Report Request members have access to these HR cases.

data.title: Manual workaround for mid week progressions
data.description: Current: Certain contracts that are based on hours worked require the progressions to be effective on the date the employee becomes eligible. Since Payroll hours become available a week later, all the updates are retroactive. Therefore, a manual process is done in current state to identify the day of the week an employee meets the hours to progress to the next step and then update the assignment record using that effective date. Both Hours and Effective date, Step entry date are currently updated to keep everything in sync. Future The Grade Ladders can be defined to progress employees on the eligibility date. However, this will continue to be a retroactive update since the hours worked aren t factored in until a week later. Since the hours worked would not be supplied on a daily basis to determine the exact day of meeting the eligibility criteria, a manual process will need to be continued to ensure the progressions take effect on the correct effective date. Effective date, Step entry date will be updated in Cloud and then it will flow to Peoplesoft. However, hours worked will not be able to be adjusted as hours are calculated correctly but they are just late. This may be revisited in Wave 2. So what: I need to understand the manual workaround to ensure progressions take effect on the correct date.

data.title: Audit report to identify salary change records that do not have corresponding assignment change rows
data.description: Because assignment and salary data are held in a single record in PS but separate records in Oracle, we need a process in place to identify where salary changes are made without associated assignment changes. The two main areas where I think this would happen would be from merit increases without promotion from Workforce Compensation and grade rate synchronization from wage progression. We need a report to identify where there exists a salary row without a corresponding assignment change row so these rows can be created. It should also contain a layout to generate the actual HDL file to create the missing rows. Once Wave 2 is live, this would no longer be necessary.

data.title: Standard definition for Sign On Bonus
data.description: Current: Lack of standard definition criteria for sign on bonus. In Pharmacy, there are sign on bonuses that are spread through a number of years. Future: A sign on bonus has a one time payment and is a smaller amount. Larger payments will be spread throughout a period of time any payment that is spread over a period of time will not be considered a sign on bonus. Instead, it will be considered a special cash incentive. So what: Those involved in the process will need training on standard definitions

data.title: Merit Requirements for employees in Philippines
data.description: Employees in Manila have a different budget and pay philosophies. A separate plan will need to be set up to administer their merits. A single merit based plan will be created in Oracle Cloud with the following components: Eligibility rules to pull all eligible employees into the plan https: albertsons1.atlassian.net browse HCM 4118 https: albertsons1.atlassian.net browse HCM 4118 smart link Approval Hierarchy to route the worksheets for approval https: albertsons1.atlassian.net browse HCM 4122 https: albertsons1.atlassian.net browse HCM 4122 smart link Worksheet layout to display employee information that is relevant to the plan The same worksheet layout will be used for US, Canada and Philippines https: albertsons1.atlassian.net browse HCM 1587 https: albertsons1.atlassian.net browse HCM 1587 smart link Merit Increase factors and rules The same merit matrix design will apply to employees in US, Canada and Philippines. The overall percentages in the matrix will differ for the Philippines https: albertsons1.atlassian.net browse HCM 1751 https: albertsons1.atlassian.net browse HCM 1751 smart link Proration rules The same proration rules will apply to employees in the US, Canada and Philippines https: albertsons1.atlassian.net browse HCM 1585 https: albertsons1.atlassian.net browse HCM 1585 smart link Lump Sum calculation rules The same lump sum rules will apply to employees in the US, Canada and Philippines https: albertsons1.atlassian.net browse HCM 1626 https: albertsons1.atlassian.net browse HCM 1626 smart link Worker level Budgeting https: albertsons1.atlassian.net browse HCM 1321 https: albertsons1.atlassian.net browse HCM 1321 smart link A single compensation change statement for Merits https: albertsons1.atlassian.net browse HCM 4126 https: albertsons1.atlassian.net browse HCM 4126 smart link Employees that are on a long term leave of absence Medical Maternity at the time of merits being effective will still be eligible but should not get their merit increase until they return from leave.

data.title: Eligiblity rules for Annual Quarterly Bonus Plans
data.description: Eligibility will be driven off of Positions. We will be configuring 3 flexfields at the Position level to capture the following: 1 Bonus Plan 2 Bonus Target 3 Bonus Target The Bonus plan field will be used to determine which plan an employee is eligible for. An employee must be employed through the end of the Fiscal Quarter for Quarterly bonuses and end of the Fiscal Year for Annual bonuses to be eligible. If the participant terminates after the end of the Quarter or Fiscal Year for reasons of dishonesty or serious misconduct, they will be ineligible for a bonus. Certain Terminated employees are also eligible for a prorated bonus: 1 Participants terminated due to store closures, sale of primary work location or due to elimination of certain positions are eligible for a prorated bonus. 2 If the Participant terminates at or after age 55 with 10 continuous years of service, any earned bonus is paid, based upon the time actually worked. 3 If the Participant terminates, as a result of death, a prorated bonus payment is made, based upon the time actually worked. 4 If the Participant terminates, as a result of an approved disability, a prorated bonus payment is made, based upon the time actually worked.

data.title: Proration Rules for Annual Quarterly Bonus
data.description: A standard set of proration rules will be configured to handle position job changes, LOA, Salary changes and Bonus Target revisions. Prorations will be calculated based on number of active weeks: A full continuous week of absence is considered an inactive week. The following proration rules will apply to both the annual and quarterly bonus plans unless otherwise noted. Prorated if change in bonus target increase or decrease or eligibility due to promotion or demotion based on number of weeks worked in position Prorated based on change in salary only applies to all plans except retail and Supply Mfg DC Supervisors Prorated if change in store location based on store result for number of weeks worked in each location only applies to Retail employees Prorated if absent from work for 1 week or more on an approved leave due to medical, personal or any legally protected reason including military leave , employee is eligible for a prorated bonus based on the number of weeks actually worked Participants terminated due to store closures, sale of primary work location or due to elimination of certain positions are eligible for a prorated bonus If the Participant terminates at or after age 55 with 10 continuous years of service, any earned bonus is paid, based upon the time actually worked. If the Participant terminates, as a result of death, a prorated bonus payment is made, based upon the time actually worked. If the Participant terminates, as a result of an approved disability, a prorated bonus payment is made, based upon the time actually worked. Additional notes: New stores bonus eligible employees who transfer during the Fiscal Quarter to a new store will receive, for the time worked in the new store, the higher better bonus result from either the new store or the store in which the employee transferred from only applies to Retail employees Closed stores bonus eligible employees who complete their time worked in a closed store will receive, for the time worked, the store result or 100 whichever is greater only applies to Retail employees

data.title: Workforce Compensation Plan to Administer Annual Bonuses US and Canada Employees
data.description: Detailed eligibility requirements, proration rules, measures, worksheet layout, bonus calculations and compensation change statement templates will be captured in this ticket. The Bonus effective date is different based on the Pay Group the employee falls under this date needs to be captured in the bonus worksheets and used as part of the Compensation to HR Transfer process. Eligible Salary for Hourly employees should be the annualized salary with the FTE factored in. For Salaried employees, the eligible salary would be the annualized full time salary. 10 27: For the Bonus calculations to work correctly, Position Start Dates on the assignment need to align with the Pay Week Begin Dates. Since PSFT doesn t have positions, there will be instances where data converted into cloud prior to Q4 2021 will have positions that are out of sync with the pay week begin dates. For this purpose, override columns will be added on the comp worksheet for the business to manually identify impacted employees, determine the correct weeks eligible for each position and enter that information onto the override columns in the worksheet.

data.title: Associate has 72 hours to complete section 2 of I 9 after starting
data.description: Current : There is a hard stop if the employee has not completed section 2 of their I 9. You can t hire without section 2, they can t be an employee until section 2 is completed. It is currently a Day 1 task and will continue to be a Day 1 task. Future : Employee will be a worker before section 2 is completed. Employees have 72 hours to complete section 2 of their I 9. if not completed by Day 2, they cannot work. HRBP would need to be the one following up on it. color: ff5630 To be determined: color Hard stops to prevent some system tasks before section 2 but that doesn t prevent them from clocking in and working. ADP integration might change Needs to be seamless follow up and oversight process because of compliance, most likely done by the HRBP

data.title: Step Progressions with a Flat Increase to Base Rate
data.description: Certain Step Progressions involve an Increase Amount being captured as the Step Rate. This increase amount will need to be added to the Employee s Base Rate rather than replacing the employee s base rate with the grade step rate. Example: Employees can be hired at an open rate and then instead of having a rate at each step, each step will have what is the increase the employee will get on their hourly rate. Example: 0.25 after 30 days of continuous days of service, then 0.20 on the six month anniversary of their start date, 0.20 every six months through their 30 month anniversary date.

data.title: Ability to capture and calculate Trust Contract Level for employees
data.description: The Contract Trust Level is automatically calculated based on these attributes from an employee s job record: Employee s labor agreement Employee s status translation if an employee is temporary whether full time or part time the status Temporary, if employee is Regular and part time Part time Employee s Labor Job Class Trust Entry Date Each labor agreement has different values and dates that contribute to the Contract Trust Level Field This field gets updated as part of two different process: 445 process that runs the night before the trust calculation process every month HRM808 process

data.title: Ability to capture and populate Trust Entry Date
data.description: The trust entry date is independent from an employee s assignment dates data and is a point in time date and not effective dated. This date is currently populated in two different ways: Automatically through code behind the scenes on the job data page this happens as part of the process that brings in new hires or employee job data Lock TED flag indicates the trust entry date should not be changed automatically through the process and that the trust team will change if needed Details: Trust Team can manually update the Trust Entry date and the Lock Trust Entry Date. When employee is hired, the system defaults the Trust Entry date to the employee s hire date. When employee changes from Temp to Regular, Trust Entry date does not change. When employee is rehired and Lock TED Y , then Trust entry date does not change. When employee is rehired and Lock TED N : If employee is from Company 002 VONS , the Trust Entry date defaults to the employee s Company seniority date. Otherwise, the Trust Entry date defaults to the effective date of rehire. When employee transfers from one company to another different FEIN , the Trust Entry date does not change. When employee changes job position, the Trust Entry date does not change.

data.title: Handling Manual Step Progressions
data.description: Some CBAs have progressions where either the entire progression is manual or certain steps in the progression ladder are manual.

data.title: There will be a standard process flow for PIPs across the organization
data.description: Current: There is no one best way for administering PIPs Future: The PIP Process Flow will include the following steps: 1. Manager initiates the process identifies the need for a PIP 2. Manager evaluation of the associate manager fills in the performance document and the action plan 3. HR to approve the PIP document once the manager has completed the evaluation and filled in the action plan 4. Share Performance Document Manager sharing the performance document with the associate 5. For each Check in should be at least 1 per 30D, to be added by Manager per system function : a. Confirm Review Meeting Manager meets with the associate to discuss the contents of the PIP initiation b. Acknowledge Review Meeting Associate to acknowledge that a review meeting was held c. Associate Feedback allows the associate to add comments d. Manager Comments Manager to add notes towards the end of the PIP cycle to summarize progress 6. HR Final Approval HR to review Manager s notes and close out the PIP a. If demotion and termination HR should approve the term demotion So what: I will need to be familiar with the process flow and my role in it.

data.title: PIP Check in Documents will not be editable once completed
data.description: Current: Future: As part of the PIP process, once a check in document has been completed by the manager and the associate, it should not be editable. This ensures that neither the manager nor the associate is able to go back to a prior check in and make changes. So what: The People Manager can not go back to a prior PIP check in and make changes.

data.title: Managers with Overdue Worker Completion Rates OTBI Reports will have different functionality
data.description: Current: Dashboards are assigned to managers and stakeholders by Learning Team. The user interface is a pie chart showing complete, incomplete and in progress. These can be exported and filtered Future: OLC Dashboard will need to be configured so there is one source of truth and pushed to managers and stakeholders so they can be easily accessed. Dashboard are bar charts with export capabilities and more filtering options. functionality is dramatically different. data.title: Oracle is an integrated system, and has a different interface Landing Page, Learning Page, Filters, etc.
data.description: Current: LMS is a standalone system. When you go into it, all you re seeing is learning. Future: OLC interface is significantly different from the current LMS. Now you can see learning, PM, onboarding, etc. because it s integrated. The Landing page contains all HR activities in an integrated system, and Learning is accessed through a learning icon not automatically when logged into the application . Define Current Learning, What to learn and my learning communities. Review entire learning page. Learning Communities are taking the place of audiences . Putting together a set of required learning for a community. Navigation of each page and use of filters. There will need to be two versions of training: one simple skill training for Retail and one detailed for Corporate professional development So what: Corporate learners will need to receive detailed training

data.title: Better data integrity for learning to provide better analytics
data.description: Current:Just reporting on completion and non completion. Future: Better data in the system will provide better analytics and save time. This will require training on application filters for People Managers and HRBPs, as well as distribution for preset dashboards. So what: Ability for more in depth analysis Looking at using learning analytics as a predictive tool to forecast turnover and other HR metrics. Integration with other HR metrics.

data.title: Next Generation Search Engine will result in faster response times, quality search results, ability to find learning catalogs easier, resulting in a more seamless experience for Learning Analysts
data.description: Current State: Search is not optimized for users. The learner catalog is customized by division and only contains the course the division wants the learner to see. Future State: Participating in the Early Adopter Program for Next Generation Search Engine will result in faster response times, quality search results, ability to find learning catalogs easier. There will only be one catalog which will contain the set of OBW courses for all divisions, not unique to one division. So what: Improved search experience for Learning Analysts using the LMS

data.title: Checklist for Stock Administrator when VP promotion includes equity grant
data.description: After the offer letter for VP promotion has been accepted and the internal candidate has been moved to HR, the Stock Administrator should receive a checklist task or notification with to do s related to processing equity grants for that associate. Certain employees will be going through internal promotions and Background checks are also run for these promotes and then checklist tasks to be triggered for promotion.

data.title: Offer letter for VP and above promotions
data.description: Offer letter template for VP and above should include the following with effective dates: comp change immediate equity grant target equity special cash incentive Once the internal candidate is moved to HR, these components should automatically be applied to the individual in the system

data.title: New Hire buddy is a new program and managers will assign the buddy
data.description: Current: There is no new hire buddy program or assignment in the system Future: New Hire buddy will be assigned by the manager. This will not happen in Oracle So what: the new hire buddy program will be stood up to have someone be a point of contact to help a new hire navigate the organization and checks in periodically to answer various questions. Guidelines and directives will need to be put in place for the program to get off the ground.

data.title: Create a report to provide engagement survey response rates to key stakeholders
data.description: When an engagement survey is launched, we should send periodic reports to managers with more than 10 people within their hierarchy to provide visibility into their response rate so that they can encourage responses where possible.

data.title: History tracking of all changes within Recruiting for audit trail
data.description: History Tracking of all changes at what places for audit trail, changes on Requisition, changes to candidates. Track Time stamp of events of all changes. The history data that is currently reportable is specific to either a Job Requisition or to the candidates application, but not the individual candidate. Fields under the following folders can be used for this information: Job Application History Event Details Job Requisition History Event Details With that, the data available for reporting is limited to the following event types and the fields listed in the above folders: Requisitions: PHASE ACTIVATION, PHASE COMPLETION, REQUISITION REDRAFTED, REQUISITION REOPENED, STATE ACTIVATION Applications: ACTION EXECUTED AUTOMATICALLY, ADD INTERACTION, ADD POOL, ADD REQ, COLLECT FEEDBACK, CREATE JOB OFFER, PHASE ACTIVATION, PHASE COMPLETION, RETURN TO PRIOR PHASE, RETURN TO PRIOR STATE, SEND EMAIL, STATE ACTIVATION Any data outside of the above will not be reportable at this time. Submitting an enhancement request: Idea Number: b39d59729b Sr Number SR 3 24881064021 Gap Description Submitting an enhancement request: Idea Number: b39d59729b Sr Number SR 3 24881064021

data.title: Create a report to notify employees with a placeholder SSN and no actual SSN to provide their updated data
data.description: Create a report that identifies all employees with a placeholder SSN but no actual SSN. This should be scheduled to run on a weekly basis and notify both the employee and HR site support of the missing SSNs and request that they provide these details. This primarily impacts J1 visa employees but could apply to others as well. The second notice should include the manager. The third notice should also include division HR legal. First notification: 21 days Second notification: 5 days after the first. This should include verbiage that this will be escalated if not addressed within 5 days. Third notification: 5 days after the second. accountid:5a68d06bed79b82e1322e77b Based on 1 26 meeting both 2nd and 3rd notifications should go to HR and Legal. First notification : Employee, Supervisor, Store Mailbox Second notification : Employee, Supervisor, Store Mailbox , HR and Legal Third notification : Employee, Supervisor, Store Mailbox , HR and Legal Need to identify an alternative or solve for store mailbox

data.title: Managers with Overdue Worker Completion Rates OTBI Reports will have different functionality
data.description: Current: Dashboards are assigned to managers and stakeholders by Learning Team. The user interface is a pie chart showing complete, incomplete and in progress. These can be exported and filtered Future: OLC Dashboard will need to be configured so there is one source of truth and pushed to managers and stakeholders so they can be easily accessed. Dashboard are bar charts with export capabilities and more filtering options. functionality is dramatically different. Additional training required for this report So what: This is a new report and functionality that needs to be trained on its use Impact: Learning team, personnel coordinator, and employee manager accountid:5f7f140ae31b69006fdf014e accountid:5c585ca195f91f3a04204623 accountid:5a67a91e2eed6b2d0236e0d5 accountid:5a67a9189089ba71829fce28

data.title: Learning Course Metrics OTBI Dashboard will have different functionality
data.description: Current: Dashboards are assigned to managers and stakeholders by Learning Team. The user interface is a pie chart showing complete, incomplete and in progress. These can be exported and filtered Future: OLC Dashboard will need to be configured so there is one source of truth and pushed to managers and stakeholders so they can be easily accessed. Dashboard are bar charts with export capabilities and more filtering options. functionality is dramatically different. Report need to be on the HR Dashboard So what: This has to be easy report is pre configured and has defined data so managers can manage the training and compliance for their employees. What does this mean for me I need to understand how to use the of the OTBI Learning Course Metric Dashboard, How to see a summary of complete and incomplete learning activities for my direct reports and how to drill down to specific courses and employees. Impact: Learning team, personnel coordinator, and employee manager accountid:5f7f140ae31b69006fdf014e accountid:5c585ca195f91f3a04204623 accountid:5a67a91e2eed6b2d0236e0d5 accountid:5a67a9189089ba71829fce28

data.title: Additions to learning conversion scope
data.description: The following items have been identified as needing conversion but are currently not in scope: 1. Documents of Record conversion conversion of signed policy packets currently reside in legacy learning platform for all active learners, termed employees and 2 years termed contractors. 2. Terminated Contingent Workers conversion This request comes at the business need that ABS frequently rehire contingent workers and sometimes have to convert over 20 learning records for those people. color: ff5630 Just to clarify our discussions Terminated contingent worker training records over 2 years will be in the data warehouse for legal purposes. If a terminated contingent 2 years will be considered a new contingent worker or new employee and will have to complete all required training even if they have completed the training 2 years ago as a contingent worker. It is not in scope to keep 2 years terminated workers in HCM color 3. Quizzes This will be reviewed as a part of the validate checkpoint. accountid:5f7f140ae31b69006fdf014e accountid:5a67a91b8b530e2868b1aa64 accountid:5a68d06bed79b82e1322e77b accountid:557058:fe4fceb2 593b 4503 bcfe 74bc7099fcf6 accountid:5f7f12434d09f7007638fa7f

data.title: Oracle is an integrated system, and has a different interface Landing Page, Learning Page, Filters, etc.
data.description: Current: Future: OLC interface is significantly different from the current LMS. The Landing page contains all HR activities in an integrated system, and Learning is accessed through a learning icon not automatically when logged into the application . Define Current Learning, What to learn and my learning communities. Review entire learning page. Navigation of each page and use of filters. There will need to be two versions of training: one simple skill training for Retail and one detail for Corporate professional development So what: Retail associates will need to receive a simple training for OLC

data.title: Quarterly Annual Bonus Plan Consolidated view of the employee s record when factoring in position changes, promotions, salary adjustments and LOA
data.description: Current: When an employee gets a salary adjustment, switches positions or goes on a leave of absence, the bonus worksheets will display a single row for every change. In this example, the employee s bonus calculation will be split into 3 records with each record corresponding to an individual row in the bonus worksheet. Future: All changes will be captured in a single row instead of being split into multiple rows. Leave of absences scenarios will be incorporated into the calculation for number of weeks eligible.

data.title: Ability for employees to reset passwords more easily when they expire
data.description: Current: The current process to reset passwords for employees whose passwords expire or are forgotten is very manual and cumbersome. Future: Users will be able to reset their own passwords natively with Fusion SSO calling into the help desk will not be required. color: ff5630 Closing since this isn t a change. color

data.title: Workforce Compensation Plans to Administer Quarterly Bonuses US and Canada Employees
data.description: Detailed eligibility requirements, proration rules, measures, worksheet layout, bonus calculations and compensation change statement templates will be captured in this ticket. The Bonus effective date is different based on the Pay Group the employee falls under this date needs to be captured in the bonus worksheets and used as part of the Compensation to HR Transfer process. Eligible Salary for Hourly employees should be the annualized salary with the FTE factored in. For Salaried employees, the eligible salary would be the annualized full time salary.

data.title: Flexfields needed at the Position level to capture Bonus Plan information
data.description: At the Position level, we will need to create 3 flexfields to capture the following: 1 Bonus Plan should be a lookup 2 Bonus Target 3 Bonus Target

data.title: Capture additional termination reason details
data.description: During the HR summit, the team expressed a desire to track additional more detailed reason for termination. This would need to be some sort of checklist vs. a freeform field due to compliance concerns. Desire to capture reasons why employees are terminated or resigning so it can be used for generating appropriate analytics. Intention is to capture this data using 4 5 categories. Since termination reasons which are currently a large list are already captured, it was suggested to review these as part of CRP 1 and classify them into categories needed for analytics instead of adding an additional category DFF on the termination transactions. If this does not work then a category filed is required to capture the high level classification for termination reasons.

data.title: Hierarchy for validation of valid workforce structure combinations
data.description: Each of the following attributes assigned to an employee should follow a hierarchy where the valid values for each attribute are based on the prior attribute selection: Company Paygroup Location Union Non Union Labor Agreement Department Position Job Employment Category Full time Part time current valid values are defined at the valid job code within the labor agreement Regular Temporary current valid values are defined at the valid job code within the labor agreement accountid:557058:d5e328c1 5c15 4967 abe6 75862c1498f2 I think we can accommodate some of these requirements, but we may need to come up with some creative alternatives for some of the other items on this list e.g., paygroup DFF LOV uses a value set based on legal employer, labor agreement naturally falls under a union accountid:5eebb63a1bf4530abd284a67 please update with a comment if I ve left anything off or gotten anything out of order.

data.title: Special Cash Incentives
data.description: In current state, Special Cash Incentives are currently offered as part of the Recruiting workstream. While the approval process will be built into ORC, an Individual compensation plan will be built into the Compensation module to support this process. The Individual compensation plan will include two options for US and two options for Canada: Special Cash Incentive Below Officer CA Special Cash Incentive Officer CA Special Cash Incentive Below Officer US Special Cash Incentive Officer US Special Cash Incentives will not be configured for PHP LDG.

data.title: Sign On Bonus Requirement
data.description: In current state, Sign On Bonuses are currently offered as part of the Recruiting workstream. While the approval process will be built into ORC, an Individual compensation plan will be built into the Compensation module to support this process. The Individual compensation plan will include two options for US and two options for Canada: Sign On Bonus Below Officer CA Sign On Bonus Officer CA Sign On Bonus Below Officer US Sign On Bonus Officer US Sign On Bonuses will not be configured for PHP LDG.

data.title: Referral Bonus Requirement
data.description: In current state, Employee Referral Bonuses are currently offered as part of the Recruiting workstream. While the approval process will be built into ORC, an Individual compensation plan will be built into the Compensation module to support this process. Update on 6 25: Access will be restricted to Comp Manager Only. Update from accountid:5f7f140ee0e85a006ea851bc after discussing with the Recruiting team on 7 28: We will not be building an Individual Compensation Award for Referral Bonuses in Wave 1. This will be deferred to Wave 2. Need to come up with a one best way for handling referral bonuses and an end to end process needs to be established from Recruiting to Payroll.

data.title: Additional National Identifier Type needed for J1 placeholder SSN
data.description: J1 employees don t usually have an SSN upon hire so there needs to be a process to generate the placeholder SSN.

data.title: Notification to managers for upcoming termination date of contingent workers
data.description: Managers should receive a notification 2 months prior to their contingent worker s termination date

data.title: Limited access to terminated employees
data.description: Current: Once a term record is entered in PS, a feed to IDM sends info on term record which then updates EE s LDAP ID on network to inactive. EE can no longer access the ABS network so no way to get to PS or any other environment application Within PS, we have dynamic assignment of ESS Roles when EEs become active and also removal of Roles when EE is terminated. Future: A custom security role will be created for terminated employees that only includes access to required areas such as: W2s link for Wave 1 Payslips link for wave 1 HR Help Desk create tickets Update contact details phone, address, email Access Knowledge articles Link to request VOE letters Reduce calls to contact center since they will have access to their payslips

data.title: Ability to track US Work Eligibility flag
data.description: This is a Yes No flag in PS that is used to track when an employee s I9 has been received.

data.title: Ability to capture Org Instance Service Date
data.description: Displays the effective date on which the service of a person commenced with the organization. The date is provided by default from the effective date of the job record with an action of Hire, Add Contingent Worker, or Add POI Instance. Select the Override check box to override this date to enter an earlier service date, for example if the person has previously worked for the company or an affiliate.

data.title: Ability to capture Professional Experience Date
data.description: Displays the earliest date on which the worker started working in a job that required skills that are directly related to the worker s current position.

data.title: Bargaining Units in future state
data.description: In the current state Bargaining Units in PeopleSoft rollup to multiple Unions many to many relation .This is due to two reasons: Multiple Union codes are set up in the system for same unions to reflect how these contracts are negotiated. Typically clerks, meat, and pharmacy even though in same Union will have very different rules. There are locals with same code. Local 1546 is in both UFCW as well as International Assoc. of Machinists. but here it is two separate locals happen to have same number. Oracle Structure: In Oracle HCM Cloud, bargaining unit can be tied to only one Union , they cannot rollup to multiple Unions.

data.title: High Volume Recruiter Security Role
data.description: High Volume Recruiter should have the ability to create standard requisitions. They will need this capability to move a candidate from a pipeline req to a standard req in order to create an offer. High Volume Recruiter should not have the ability to post requisitions accountid:5f43e22cfcaf93003bed3271 Please add additional security details for High Volume Recruiter. Copy of Recruiter Role. Provides access to candidate pools, assessment and screening, and job requisitions. Has broader acces to recruiting features which includes all recruiting tasks, has limited visibility on objects. Create a Standard Requisition but not access post the requisitions Able to see requisitions specific only to their business units or their Divisions No access to campaign section View and access the candidates pools already created by other recruiters but don t create a new candidate pool High volume recruiters to select access only HV offer template and no other templates This is last priority if possible . Should not be able to access worker type contingent worker or defaulting the worker type to Employee and not create Pipeline Requisitions High Volume recruiter Not have access to all req templates but only to certain req templates. If a recruiter is hiring for a certain location, if that location has Starbucks dept, then should see requisitions related to that or else no. when hiring someone or moving to standard req. High volume recruiter see departments only specific to that location from Core HR accountid:5f6ccd843672f3006a469169

data.title: Handling step progression scenarios where employees progress to a step with a lower rate
data.description: Certain step progression rules have a break in rate where the entry step has a higher rate than the next step in the grade. Example: Step 1: 15 Step 2: 10 Although there is a setting to update salary if proposed salary is less than current salary , it only works for online transactions such as promotions or transfers. For Step progression scenarios, the step progression process will error when processing employees that move from a step with a higher rate to a step with a lower rate. Oracle confirmed that these scenarios will have to be handled manually as the progression process current does not support it.

data.description: Current: People Managers and Learning Admin COE can create recommendations or assignments for training Future: HR Site Support will be able to create recommendations or assignments for training So what: This is an additional task for HR Site Support, and can help ease the load on People Managers Course assignments are made in consultation with the stakeholder i.e. info sec determines the audience for Privacy and Information Security. The stakeholder with the advice consultation of the HR Representative. Course recommendations are made by the people manager or HR Representative based on personal development performance management, etc. OLC has ability for ee to recommend courses to each other. Managers HR support team has the ability to recommend courses to the learner.

data.title: Analysis of Ad Hoc Compensation Award Programs
data.description: Ad hoc compensation awards can be handled in the Oracle Compensation module through the use of Individual compensation plans ICPs . Potential candidates for ICPs are assessed based on whether we can put a process in place to eliminate sending a list to Payroll through spreadsheets but instead, have an initiator for the process and route it to an approval chain if needed and once it s approved, the award gets sent directly to Payroll through element entries . Since ICPs have to be manually initiated, it is best reserved for ad hoc awards that are given to a small population. The Award Programs Current State document captures all of the current state ad hoc awards that are being offered across the different businesses. The Award Programs Current State Analysis document captures a consolidated list of current offerings and reasons for which awards will be built into Oracle as part of the compensation module. To summarize the analysis, ICPs will be created for the following ad hoc awards: 1 Referral Bonus 2 Special Cash Incentives 3 Sign On Bonus 4 Retention Bonus Individual deviation tickets will be created for each of the above mentioned ICPs.

data.title: Agility testing and process sending notification to pending worker after background check is passed
data.description: Send an Notification to the pending worker to complete the agility test only after background check is initiated and passed. Some DC s have vendor for this testing and Some DC s do in house physical agility testing. Some DCs initiate agility testing after background check has passed which is what legal recommends. Based on the agility test pass they should be moved forward or cancel the work relationship of pending worker and should not go through Agility testing. This is mainly for Supplychains Truck Drivers, Order Selectors Note: ABS don t want to have any vendor but only have a notification or task . Urgent hires whether or not background is pass or fail California Agility testing is done and sometimes waived. Sometimes physical agility testing is done or sometimes waived its not required and optional . Its better to have manual conversion of employee when agility testing is approved.

data.title: i 9 Integration and email type
data.description: When configuring I 9 integration, although the default employee email type is Work Email, you can change that. Whichever email type you use, you must ensure that the worker also has the same email type until the time the I 9 process is completed. That is, if you specify Home Email as the I 9 email type, the worker should also have Home Email and this should not change when the I 9 process is in progress For sending Login details to pending worker The email type should be changed to workemail even though there is personal email address. Only after i 9 process is complete, the work email address to be tied to employees who have work email address and others will have personal email address tied to work email type for who dont have work email address

data.title: Auto numbering for Person ID that picks unused numbers
data.description: Seeking a process that creates a custom number sequence and may address the gap numbering for the Person ID values. Oracle has other customers seeking a similar requirement. We have used about 2.5 million of the available 9.9 million EMPLID values in PeopleSoft while using the seven digit field. This would eliminate the need to move to a eight or nine digit length value with this implementation. The downstream impacts of changing the length of the field is under analysis now.

There s a small of population on PIPs, so manager HRBP have it on their calendar and in conversations to make sure they re giving timely and accurate feedback. Future: Manager will need to manually put the check ins into Oracle and it will be at their discretion and ad hoc. The system does not automate any part of the check in process. So What: The check ins are still at my discretion, but I now need to put them in Oracle. Manager HRBP should be aware of who is on a PIP so they can monitor

data.title: Create a Workforce Compensation Plan to Administer Equity
data.description: Design and configure a workforce compensation plan to handle Equity for VPs and above. The plan design should include the following: Eligibility Criteria to pull all the eligible participants VPs and above includes 1 employee in Canada and 1 in Manila A single compensation change statement will be configured for all equity eligible employees and will be distributed by the EVPs. The TB and PB Sample statement attached in the ticket will be configured for this plan Alerts will not be used Allocations will be made at the manager s discretion EVPs . Grants will be issued in dollar amounts relative to the performance rating Worksheet display to include the following fields: Person Name Performance Rating Last Year Equity s Target Equity s to be entered or loaded by comp Contractual s to be entered or loaded by Comp Manager recommendation s to be entered by managers Time Based Units s 50 of Manager recommended s based on eligibility to be hidden from managers Performance Based Units s 50 of Manager recommended s based on eligibility to be hidden from managers Time Based Units Time Based Units s FMV to be hidden from managers Performance Based Units Performance Based Units s FMV to be hidden from managers FMV on Grant Day Defaulted before statements are generated and hidden to managers Approvals will be disabled Submissions will be enabled

data.title: Ability to capture SSN changes in HCM Cloud. This data should be available for audit reports and integrations like 401 K
data.description: Current State The volume of SSN changes is huge at Albertson s and PeopleSoft does not store history of prior SSN s assigned to an employee. The only way to figure out what an employee s prior SSN s was is by running a query against an audit table. This query tracks only SSN changes if the employee ID did not change. The query has some quirks and takes some analysis to determine the correct history. The employee s whose employee number changes along with the SSN are not included the old SSN is on the record with ACTION TER, ACTION REASON DID . Would it be possible to include SSN and or Employee ID changes in the employee history on Oracle This would make tracking and reporting these employees so much easier. We should build SSN change history for active and term d employees. Need to start with history for the current year plus the prior year. Retirements team can provide further inputs in deep dive session.

data.title: Hiring Manager Creates Requisition for Professional Reqs
data.description: Current: TA Recruiter creates all requisitions in RM. Store Director is in contact with division recruiter who then posts the job. Applicants go to store director to be selected. Not all divisions have a TA person in the office. Could also be an HRBP opening req . Same for supply chain. Future: Hiring manager will begin the creation of the requisition through Oracle instead of email . Hiring manager initiates the requisition then Recruiter from Requisition should approve. If a High Volume recruiter initiates the requisition then Bypass the approvals So What: more involvement in requisition process, will need to understand how to do this process Department manager, meat manager, store director is the hiring manager. Store director will still have to work with division recruiter HRBP to open reqs. Store Directors don t do this frequently. Store Directors HR Site Support does not have access to post requisitions, only HR has that access. Professional Recruiters at the division level will own professional reqs in stores. If Hiring Manager creates standard pro requisition, it goes to Division HR approval groups If High Volume Recruiter creates standard requisition it will bypass approval. Otherwise it would require HR approval every time a candidate is moved from a pipeline to a standard req to generate an offer.

data.title: Convert to Worker prior to Day 1 when background check has been passed
data.description: Current: need to convert applicant to worker prior to day 1 so that the systems integrate appropriately. Recruiters have to go in and collect onboarding details supervisor ID, pay rate, standard hours and submit that which manually triggers hire call to PS. Future: Convert to pending worker at acceptance and convert to worker when background check has been passed by new hire with a Future Date for hire. Integration between systems will alleviate the pain points and need for converting earlier. This process is automated in the future, so the recruiter will not have to manually do this in the future. Once the background check has passed, auto convert to employee.

data.description: Current: Managers are unable to tell if their employees are on or have succession plans easily Future: Managers will be able to see their people if they have succession plans and if they re on succession plans in Oracle So What: Better and more robust succession planning collaboration with Talent Management Analysts who are managing succession planning on the backend

data.title: Collaboration with HRBPs due to MSS ability to see their people if they have succession plans or if they re on succession plans
data.description: Current: Managers are unable to tell if their employees are on or have succession plans easily Future: Managers will be able to see their people if they have succession plans and if they re on succession plans in Oracle So What: Better and more robust succession planning collaboration with HRBPs who have previously handled succession planning

data.title: New Process for Talent Reviews in Oracle Groups that don t do Talent Reviews
data.description: Current: Some divisions do not do talent reviews and do not have a process in place. Future: The talent review process will occur inside the system. It will involve administrative work for the HRBP HRM, such as setting up plans, talent review meetings, and adding participants. People Managers will also need to participate in the talent review process. So what: This is additional work for the HRBPs HRMs that have not done talent reviews historically, as well as for People Managers who have not participated in the talent review process. They will need to understand the process in Oracle.

data.title: Competencies will be part of the Performance Review
data.description: Current: Competencies are not specifically a focus for performance reviews. Future: Competencies will be part of the performance review, in addition to goals. So what: Associates and People Managers will need to comment on performance on competencies.

data.title: Oracle will have pre populated metrics to help streamline the process and align goals with P L
data.description: Current State: Goals are not specifically aligned to P L Future State: Oracle will have pre populated metrics to help streamline the process and align goals with P L. This will occur in 2022. So what: Goals are tied to specific business outcomes, and process is streamlined. This may be a negative change for store directors who may feel as though tying goals to P L will make them more stressed under pressure

data.title: Goal setting will be in Oracle instead of paper excel

If you have a performance document for a handful employees, changing settings is locked. Once you close out of a performance doc, you can make changes. So what: Compensation Analyst will need to coordinate timing of any changes to settings for performance review in Oracle.

data.title: Multiple effective sequenced updates on salary data
data.description: Oracle Cloud does not allow multiple effective sequenced updates on the salary as it does with the assignment, unlike PeopleSoft. Albertsons uses this functionality extensively for capturing employee data updates to comprate in PeopleSoft for instances where a wage progression and a GWI occur on the same day, or to identify salary rate changes entered later with the same effective date as the top of stack row. We need to identify a solution for supporting this in Oracle Cloud.

data.title: HR Cover Letter
data.description: Requirements overview i.e. what do you need : HR Cover Letter helps with the indexing of the content within content manager. Doesn t contain any data and is simply a cover letter for when the papers get digitized. There is a barcode that is generated at the top that helps identify what the document type is in content manager. HR Cover Letters include a Document Type and sub classification known as the Document Title. image 20201221 195343.png width 1585,height 854 2. Business purpose i.e. why do you need this :: The digital barcode is used on the report for online documentation 3. Report Name : HR Cover Letter 4. Reference to current state report if any : Yes, HR Cover Letter 5. Reference to Oracle delivered report if any : Not Applicable 6. Dashboard details, if you want the report s to be presented in a dashboard: Not Applicable. From: accountid:5f8936587441ea00682df889 Sent: Tuesday, February 23, 2021 4:04 PM Subject: RE: Require additional information for Project Optimus HCM Transformation project related to MS Access Database Hi TJ We use the cover letters that are generated and sent via email at the time of termination within the PeopleSoft application. Once a store terminates an employee the Personnel Coordinator retrieves the cover letter from the email sent from PeopleSoft to use for sending the file to record retention. If an employee is terminated by the division office HR team, they send the email received from PeopleSoft to the respective personnel file owner for processing. If someone is in need of a missing cover letter it is pulled directly from PeopleSoft. We have not experienced a need for generating multiple cover letters at a time. From: accountid:5f868f279dbd090069b398be Subject: RE: Require additional information for Project Optimus HCM Transformation project related to MS Access Database Hello TJ: I ll respond for Norcal. Catie mailto:Catie.Zavala safeway.com , please disregard. For cover letters, we use the peoplesoft link to create the coversheet for scanning. However, if we have a large number of files to scan happens quite often we use the access database that Darrell is referencing. It allows us to create the sheets faster than one by one in peoplesoft. This access database is not linked to peoplesoft or any type of feed. It s a simple query pulled from peoplesoft data to load to the database. It includes terms and active employees in order to allow us to make coversheets for any current or former employee. These databases were in place Safeway pre merger and should be the same across most divisions unless the division has updated changed them. NORCAL TERMS PROMPT is a query we use in Norcal to pull the fields needed to update the access database for terminated employees. For OBW, my understanding before I went on maternity LOA the last week of Dec may have changed now is that we would be looking at potentially a solution in wave 2 for the documents that we coversheet and send in to be scanned to content manager. But in the meantime, we would have access in Wave 1 to deep links to the coversheet creation in peoplesoft and be able to pull a query of data from HCM Core data after Wave 1 go live if we needed to update our databases. Please let me know if I can answer anything else or provide any other data. From: accountid:5f868eef6932330076516e4c Sent: Tuesday, February 16, 2021 4:10 PM Subject: RE: Require additional information for Project Optimus HCM Transformation project related to MS Access Database Hello, In the current process, ALL employees require a cover letter for Content Mgr Navigator entries. The options are all available through drop down boxes in Psoft. We have not used a database for multiples, but rather do them one by one directly using Direct2HR. The updated process makes it much faster than it used to be. That said, would appreciate an option for multiples. It should also be noted that not all Supply Chain facilities are using Content Mgr for their personnel files. Several teams are still keeping paper files. Those of us using it have our own systems. At the Denver DC, we send in term files and keep paper files in house. When a single employee file starts to become too full, we pull it and get it off to imaging. In other DCs, they only send term files and yet others scan in two years worth of content at a time. Please advise if additional info is needed. Thanks

data.title: Automatically Select Background Check Package based on Job
data.description: When the recruiter creates a job requisition, the recruiter can assign one or more background check screening packages, most commonly a single package with multiple screenings. Once the recruiter has selected the desired background check partner and user account, the recruiter goes to the partner s portal to add the background check screening packages to the job requisition The background check is automatically triggered when candidates reach a specific phase and state in the candidate selection process as configured by your administrator. The background check partner obtains the candidate s info and completes the background check. Once the background check is completed, you receive a notification and you can view the status in the Screening Results section of the candidate job application. You can access the partner s site to view details about a candidate s background check results or to order additional screenings.
